Articles.Content:
Ksp was running fine for me for a long time and all of the sudden, without making any changes to Gamedata or anything else, it just started getting stuck on loading boulder-co textures. Anyone know why?

EDIT:

Removing Active Texture Management stopped KSP from crashing when trying to load the textures. But now mods I have never had problems with before are suddenly failing to load?

EDIT:

Apparently Module Manager was preventing KSP from loading, I have no idea why, since it worked just fine a few days ago.

Edited January 29, 2015 by Mattratt
